attributes.name: data-tchmi-device
attributes.description: The EtherCAT device that topology should be displayed. Use a identifier from the list which was set in the server extension.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-allow-zoom-and-pan
attributes.description: User can pan and zoom the topology view.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-toolbox-reset-view
attributes.description: Shows button in toolbox to reset (center and unzoom) view.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-experimental-mode
attributes.description: The Experimental Mode is intended only for those who understand and accept the potential risks, including untested features, unstable functionalities and unexpected behaviors; proceed with caution.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-init-topology-view
attributes.description: Adjust the initial topology view with x, y and zoom.
